Text:
A few days after Claire is invited to a ball in
Orianaâ€”

That dress looks marvelous on you. I knew that
color would suit you.
...Thank you.

Well, what is it? You went through the trouble of
even leaving me a note in my room.

But you could at least sign your name. From what was
written in it, I could tell it was you this time, but...

Pardon my lack of decorum. I needed you to come here
in preparation for the masquerade ball.

You asked me to wear my ball gown and come to this
expensive restaurant....
Rest assured, I will cover the bill.
That's not what I'm getting at!
...But, well, if you insist, I'll accept the dinner.

Yes, it's my treat. I wouldn't say it's a quid pro
quo, but today I would like you to learn manners
befitting high society.

We wouldn't want you to cause a disturbance by
making a careless mistake while undercover at the
ball.

That won't be necessary. There's no way I would
do something like that.

I may be from a lower-ranking noble family, but...
as the heiress of the Kagenou household, I've
mastered etiquette a long time ago.

Is that so? You've been on edge from the moment you
walked into the restaurant.
Hmph... Excuse me?

W-Well, what about you, then? You think you're
proficient enough to teach me etiquette, huh?

Yes, I would say I have more knowledge and
experience than you.

Pft...I don't believe you. Anyone can talk a good
game.

(She is far more stubborn than I thought... We'll
never get anywhere at this rate... Looks like I'll
have to...)

By the way, your brother...Cid Kagenou seems to be
quite close to Princess Alexia.
...Why are you mentioning that name all of a sudden?
I've heard a few rumors.

Your brother is also a fine young nobleman. And if
he's acquainted with a princess, he may have the
opportunity to appear at high society gatherings.
What are you implying?

Oh, nothing... I'm just saying that if Cid is
unfamiliar with proper etiquette, he may
end up embarrassing himself.
(Cid...embarrassed...?)

Huh? Meet at night? And I can't wear my school
uniform?
Dance...with a girl?! I-I don't know how to do that!

D-Did I...do something weird again? Why is everyone
laughing at me?! Help me, Claire!!!
No! That would be awful!

Indeed. If only he had someone near him who could
teach him proper mannersâ€”

Teach me everything about high society etiquette
right now! I'll memorize it all!

I'm pleased to see you're so motivated. Then, let us
begin first with table mannersâ€”
With pleasure!

(Oh, Master Shadow... Forgive me for using you to
sway her like this...)

Why are you staring into space like that? That's...
not good manners either, right?

...Pardon me. Now then, let's work our way up from
the basics.

Just you wait, Cid! Your big sister is going to
master the rules of etiquette just for you!

And so, prompted by Nu's tactics, Claire begins to
study etiquette. She spends the whole night
memorizing high society etiquette for Cid's sake.
